title: Create an AI-powered virtual receptionist with Google Calendar & Sheets
description:
# ü§ñAI-Powered Appointment Scheduling with Google Calendar & Sheets Virtual Receptionist Automate customer conversations with an **AI-powered virtual receptionist**. This workflow can **chat naturally with clients**, **answer general business questions** (like services, location, and hours), **check availability in Google Calendar**, **book appointments**, and **save customer details in Google Sheets**. Fully customizable for **any business type** ‚Äî salons, clinics, agencies, consultants, and more. --- ## üìñ How It Works 1. **Welcome the customer when the customer says hi** - AI greets warmly: *‚ÄúHello! I‚Äôm [AI name] from [Business name].‚Äù* 2. **Answer general questions** - Provides instant replies about services, pricing, business location, hours, and availability. 3. **Understand their need** - Identifies the service requested and preferred time. 4. **Check availability** - Queries Google Calendar for open slots. 5. **Gather customer details** - Collects name, phone, and email (optional). 6. **Confirm booking** - Creates the appointment in Google Calendar. 7. **Save records** - Logs booking and customer info into Google Sheets. --- ## ‚öôÔ∏è Setup Steps (Quick) 1. Connect your **Google Calendar** and **Google Sheets** accounts. 2. Add your **business details** (name, type, services, hours, policies) to the **Business Info Sheet**. 3. Configure your **OpenAI API key** (or use n8n free credits). 4. Optional: Connect **Twilio WhatsApp** for direct chat responses. --- ## üè¢ Example Business Info (Google Sheet) | business_id | business_name | business_type | location | phone | email | services | calendar_id | timezone | currency | working_hours | ai_name | ai_personality | ai_role | emergency_available | booking_advance_days | cancellation_hours | |-------------|-----------------|---------------------|----------------------------------|-----------------|---------------------------|----------|-----------------------|----------|----------|--------------------------------|---------|-----------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------|----------------------|-------------------| |001| Luxe Hair Studio | Hair & Beauty Salon | 123 Main Street, New York, NY 10001 | 1 (XXX) XXX-XXXX | yourbusiness@email.com | ‚ÄúHaircut & Styling (60 minutes, $3500‚Ä¶)
Hair Coloring (120 minutes, $8000‚Ä¶)
‚Ä¶‚Äù | calendar-id-here | GMT -3 | USD | Mon‚ÄìSat: 9:00 AM ‚Äì 7:00 PM, Sun: Closed | bella | Friendly, Stylish, Professional | Manages bookings, answers FAQs, recommends services, gives beauty tips, sends reminders, etc. | no | 10 | 24 | ‚úÖ **Purpose**: Supplies context (services, pricing, hours, AI personality, booking policies). üí° The AI uses this sheet to answer **general business questions** (e.g., ‚ÄúWhere are you located?‚Äù, ‚ÄúDo you do hair colouring?‚Äù, ‚ÄúWhat are your working hours?‚Äù). --- ## üìä Appointments Sheet Example | client_number | client_name | event_id | summary | services | |----------------|-------------|-----------|----------------------------------|----------| | 001 | Sarah Lee | evt-10293 | Appointment with Sarah Lee ‚Äì Haircut & Styling | Haircut & Styling | | 002 | John Smith | evt-10294 | Appointment with John Smith ‚Äì Highlights | Highlights | ‚úÖ **Purpose**: Logs confirmed bookings with service details and links back to Google Calendar. --- ## üí° Features - ‚úÖ AI receptionist with **conversation memory** - ‚úÖ **Answers FAQs** ‚Äì location, services, hours, pricing - ‚úÖ **Google Calendar integration** for real-time availability - ‚úÖ **Google Sheets integration** for customer records & reporting - ‚úÖ Customizable **AI name, role, and personality** --- ## üîë Who It‚Äôs For - **Salons & Spas** ‚Äì Manage bookings and FAQs - **Clinics & Health Services** ‚Äì Automated scheduling + patient info - **Agencies & Consultants** ‚Äì Answer inquiries + schedule meetings - **Any Service Business** ‚Äì Save time, improve customer experience
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
